Title: Relates to reverse mortgage loans; repealer
Summary: Relates to reverse mortgage loans for persons 62 years of age and older.
LawCode: Amd §§280 & 281, rpld §280-a, RP L; amd §§6-h & 14, Bank L; amd §6501, Ins L; amd §§2426 & 2428, Pub Auth L; amd §252-a, Tax L; amd §131-x, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, the banking law, the insurance law, the public authorities law, the tax law, and the social services law, in relation to reverse mortgage loans; and to repeal section 280-a of the real property law relating thereto
